title: Champion Idea
body:
Hamedaes The Blood Mongrel
| Passive: He gains 5/10/15% (at lvls 1/9/14) more armour and magic resist and doubles when below 40% health but also increases lifesteal and spell vamp by 20/40/60% (1/9/14) below 40% health
 
Cost: 3/4/5/6/7% of his Current health Cooldown: 15/13/11/9/7
| Q Hamedaes slams the ground with his fists dealing 70/100/150/230/270 +(60% of his ad)  physical damage in a cone, enemies in the middle of the cone take full damage and are slowed 50/60/70/75/80% for 0.5/0.7/1/1.3/1.5 seconds

5/7/9/11/13%  of his current health Cooldown 17/15/13/12/11
| W Passive Gains 5/10/15/20/25% lifesteal/Spellvamp 
      Active He impowers  him self and gains 10/20/30/35/40 lifesteal/spellvamp for the next 5 seconds and all his attacks deal a increase physical damage 10/30/50/70/90 (+50% of his bonus ad)|

Cost 7% maximum health Cooldown: 30/25/20/17/15 
E Spawns a Blood totem where it drains his health to get bigger and drains  his maximum health he can smash it to gain extra health and extra attack damage the bigger it is the more health and attack damage he gets. minium 10/13/16/19/21 attack damage and 100/130/160/190/210 health which to a max of 40/45/50/55/60 attack damage and 400/450/500/550/600 health and can hold 3 at a time and place down 3 The stats last for 10 seconds
(The stats dont stack with other totems and last for 30 seconds and can be destroyed from other champions 5 health)|

R 10% of his maxinum health. 130/120/110 second cooldown
Marks a champion that is also is always seen for 10 seconds and deals 20% more damage to them and deal 30% less damage to other champions and gains 40% increase movement speed to that marked champion and take 20% less damage from every other champion but take increased 20% damage from the marked champion (can not be used if they are invisible) also gains 25% tenacity during the duration

I just wanted to see what other people thought of my idea, I don't expect this to become a champion... also I would like to know what is good and what is bad about this kit. The name is just expermental, I would like him to be a health type champion, so he uses health as his resource.

replies.body: Hey this Idea is really cool but it seems an awful lot like a remake of Vladimir and Trundle. If you could maybe write or draw a description of your character's appearance maybe it would be a little more plausible as an original idea.

I wanted him to be a brawler that can place totems down or like self buffs but have no escape but I don't want his damage to be insane, I wan't it to be single target but can still survive after killing a person in a teamfight.
